### 1. Install eOS (fedora silverblue with some fancy stuff)
See [evanriley/e-os](https://github.com/evanriley/e-os)

### 2. Run Script
```bash
curl -sL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/evanriley/dotfiles/refs/heads/main/bin/dotinstall.sh | bash
```

### 3. Fix errors
Something will probably be broken. GL fixing it.
